title: retroshare06_0.6.0-0.7584~precise_i386.deb
description:
Description-For-Linux-Ubuntu-Full-Install-Package: 
RetroShare 0.6.0 beta is a cross-platform Windows,Linux,Arm,Mac private p2p sharing program that uses F2F public/private encrypted keys. It lets you share Files,Msgs,Chats,Channel Content and Forums securely with your friends, using a PGP/GPG 2048/4096bit key based web-of-trust to authenticate peers and OpenSSL PFS mode to encrypt all online communications. RS 06 beta development is nearing a release candidate on this major upgrade of the Retroshare 0.5.5 platform. RS 06 will not be fully compatible with the older RS 05 current release app but carryÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s over many of the same functions, tools and adds several more.

Retroshare 0.6.0 is a Secure,Encrypted Social Network with many,many features and offers both Darknet and Tor connections as user options. Retroshare's Fast Anonymous File Sharing is Unparalleled with any other P2P and F2F networks. 
Come and join the fun.
